title: "There Is an AI Bubble, but There Is No Small-Cap Participation"
excerpt: "One of the explanations for this action is that it is an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble, but unlike the Internet bubble or most other industrial themes, it involves all big-caps. There are almost no small-caps participating in the AI rally."
